category_names: ADA Tiles | Detectable Warning Systems (INACTIVE)|Detectable Warning Tiles
name: Surface Applied Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
Group_Name: Surface Applied Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
meta_title: Surface Applied Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
small_image_label: Surface Applied Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
thumbnail_label: Surface Applied Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world.
short_description:
• For use in Retrofit applications
  • Large perimeter beveled edges for smooth transition
  • Secured with color matched fasteners and structural adhesive
  • Surface applied tiles are 1/8" thick with beveled edges
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Surfaced Applied Tactile, available in both Rectangular and Radius, is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Surface Applied Tactile is used to retrofit over an existing concrete substrate and can be installed in as little as 10 minutes.
summary:
Available Colors



All of ADA Solutions Inc., truncated dome tactile surfaces are in full compliance with the American Disabilities Act Accessibility Guidelines (ADAAG), Public Right-of-Way (PROW) and California Title 24 Requirements. ADA Solutions Inc., products are approved for use by all major municipalities, DPW’s and state DOT's.

description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world.
short_description:
• For use in Retrofit applications
  • Large perimeter beveled edges for smooth transition
  • Secured with color matched fasteners and structural adhesive
  • Surface applied tiles are 1/8" thick with beveled edges
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Surfaced Applied Tactile, available in both Rectangular and Radius, is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Surface Applied Tactile is used to retrofit over an existing concrete substrate and can be installed in as little as 10 minutes.
summary:
Available Colors



All of ADA Solutions Inc., truncated dome tactile surfaces are in full compliance with the American Disabilities Act Accessibility Guidelines (ADAAG), Public Right-of-Way (PROW) and California Title 24 Requirements. ADA Solutions Inc., products are approved for use by all major municipalities, DPW’s and state DOT's.

description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world.
short_description:
• For use in Retrofit applications
  • Large perimeter beveled edges for smooth transition
  • Secured with color matched fasteners and structural adhesive
  • Surface applied tiles are 1/8" thick with beveled edges
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Surfaced Applied Tactile, available in both Rectangular and Radius, is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Surface Applied Tactile is used to retrofit over an existing concrete substrate and can be installed in as little as 10 minutes.
summary:
Available Colors



All of ADA Solutions Inc., truncated dome tactile surfaces are in full compliance with the American Disabilities Act Accessibility Guidelines (ADAAG), Public Right-of-Way (PROW) and California Title 24 Requirements. ADA Solutions Inc., products are approved for use by all major municipalities, DPW’s and state DOT's.
meta_keyword: Surface Applied Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Brick Red

name: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Brick Red
Group_Name: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Brick Red
meta_title: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Brick Red
small_image_label: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Brick Red
thumbnail_label: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Brick Red
description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world.
short_description:
• For use in new curb ramps or new construction
  • Pressed into place in freshly poured concrete
  • Cast-In-Place Tiles have a 1/4" nominal thickness and feature embedment ribs 3" on center through entire length of tile
  • Plastic sheeting protection covers entire surface of Cast-In-Place Tile
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Cast in Place Tactile is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Cast in Place Tactile is used for new curb ramps or new construction applications and is a great long-term solution for any project, under any weather conditions.
summary:
Available Colors

thumbnail_label: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Safety Blue
description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world.
short_description:
• For use in new curb ramps or new construction
  • Pressed into place in freshly poured concrete
  • Cast-In-Place Tiles have a 1/4" nominal thickness and feature embedment ribs 3" on center through entire length of tile
  • Plastic sheeting protection covers entire surface of Cast-In-Place Tile
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Cast in Place Tactile is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Cast in Place Tactile is used for new curb ramps or new construction applications and is a great long-term solution for any project, under any weather conditions.
summary:
Available Colors



All of ADA Solutions Inc., truncated dome tactile surfaces are in full compliance with the American Disabilities Act Accessibility Guidelines (ADAAG), Public Right-of-Way (PROW) and California Title 24 Requirements. ADA Solutions Inc., products are approved for use by all major municipalities, DPW’s and state DOT's.

description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world and the only TRUE UNIVERSAL Radius Tile in the Industry.
short_description:
• Available in CAST IN PLACE REPLACEABLE & SURFACE APPLIED
  • For use on most Radius curb applications; new construction or Retrofit
  • All Panels are pre-scored to be cut at 10’,15’ and 20’ radius

    • Radius Tactiles are made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Cast in Place Replaceable Radius Tactile is used for new curb ramps or new construction applications. The Surface Applied Radius Tactile is used to retrofit over an existing concrete substrate and can be installed in as little as 10 minutes.

name: Radius Truncated Dome Detectable Warning Systems - Seattle Yellow
Group_Name: Radius Truncated Dome Detectable Warning Systems - Seattle Yellow
meta_title: Radius Truncated Dome Detectable Warning Systems - Seattle Yellow
small_image_label: Radius Truncated Dome Detectable Warning Systems - Seattle Yellow
thumbnail_label: Radius Truncated Dome Detectable Warning Systems - Seattle Yellow
description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world and the only TRUE UNIVERSAL Radius Tile in the Industry.
short_description:
• Available in CAST IN PLACE REPLACEABLE & SURFACE APPLIED
  • For use on most Radius curb applications; new construction or Retrofit
  • All Panels are pre-scored to be cut at 10’,15’ and 20’ radius

    • Radius Tactiles are made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Cast in Place Replaceable Radius Tactile is used for new curb ramps or new construction applications. The Surface Applied Radius Tactile is used to retrofit over an existing concrete substrate and can be installed in as little as 10 minutes.
summary:
Available Colors



All of ADA Solutions Inc., truncated dome tactile surfaces are in full compliance with the American Disabilities Act Accessibility Guidelines (ADAAG), Public Right-of-Way (PROW) and California Title 24 Requirements. ADA Solutions Inc., products are approved for use by all major municipalities, DPW’s and state DOT's.

name: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
Group_Name: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
meta_title: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
small_image_label: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
thumbnail_label: Cast In Place Tactile Warning Surface Tiles - Federal Yellow
description: The most proven and trusted Detectable Warning solution in the world.
short_description:
• For use in new curb ramps or new construction
  • Pressed into place in freshly poured concrete
  • Cast-In-Place Tiles have a 1/4" nominal thickness and feature embedment ribs 3" on center through entire length of tile
  • Plastic sheeting protection covers entire surface of Cast-In-Place Tile
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Cast in Place Tactile is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Cast in Place Tactile is used for new curb ramps or new construction applications and is a great long-term solution for any project, under any weather conditions.

  • Pressed into place in freshly poured concrete
  • Cast-In-Place Tiles have a 1/4" nominal thickness and feature embedment ribs 3" on center through entire length of tile
  • Plastic sheeting protection covers entire surface of Cast-In-Place Tile
  • Standard sizes: 24" x 36", 24" x 48", 24" x 60", 36" x 48" and 36" x 60"

    • Cast in Place Tactile is made of a colorfast and UV stable homogenous glass and carbon composite with fiberglass truncated domes for enhanced durability. The Cast in Place Tactile is used for new curb ramps or new construction applications and is a great long-term solution for any project, under any weather conditions.
summary:
Available Colors



All of ADA Solutions Inc., truncated dome tactile surfaces are in full compliance with the American Disabilities Act Accessibility Guidelines (ADAAG), Public Right-of-Way (PROW) and California Title 24 Requirements. ADA Solutions Inc., products are approved for use by all major municipalities, DPW’s and state DOT's.

category_names: Adhesives
name: Adhesive 10Oz 1 Per 2X4
Group_Name: Adhesive 10Oz 1 Per 2X4
meta_title: Adhesive 10Oz 1 Per 2X4
small_image_label: Adhesive 10Oz 1 Per 2X4
thumbnail_label: Adhesive 10Oz 1 Per 2X4
description: Chem Link M-1 Adhesive
short_description:
• For interior or exterior use

  • High performance adhesive used for installation of ADA Tactile Warning Surface (TWS) Panels
summary: M-1® Adhesive/Sealant is a one-part, low odor, fast skinning (20 minutes), trowel applied/gun grade, high strength 100% solids polyether based adhesive which will provide a tenacious bond between ADA Tactile Warning Surface and Wayfinding Products and any properly prepared underlying concrete substrate. M-1® Adhesive/Sealant is solvent free, VOC compliant and will not outgas or bubble on damp surfaces. M-1® Adhesive/Sealant can also be used as a perimeter sealant for ADA TWS Product line installations. Application of the M-1® Adhesive/Sealant results in a superior architectural finish for the ADA TWS Panel, as well as creating a consistent beveled finish between the ADA TWS Panel and adjacent substrate.
meta_keyword: Adhesive 10Oz 1 Per 2X4
